EmailTemplate.name: Send Notification to Manager
EmailTemplate.subject: Project Management: A new project is assigned to you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMS_TM_Project__c.Project_Manager__c},
A new project {!EMS_TM_Project__c.Name} was created with you as the Project Manager. Please find the link to the project here.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
